alert.note: Alert for Aurora; Brule; Jerauld; Miner; Sanborn (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued December 30 at 8:16PM MST until January 01 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO 3 PM CST FRIDAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM FRIDAY TO NOON CST SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 3 inches. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 35 below zero. * WHERE...Jerauld, Sanborn, Miner, Brule and Aurora Counties. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 6 AM to 3 PM CST Friday. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from 9 PM Friday to noon CST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
